params.description: params defines the parameters of the module.

QueryParamsResponse.title: Query Params Response
QueryParamsResponse.description: QueryParamsResponse is the response type for the Query/Params RPC method.

controller_enabled.description: controller_enabled enables or disables the controller submodule.

ibc.applications.interchain_accounts.con.title: Params
ibc.applications.interchain_accounts.con.description: Params defines the set of on-chain interchain accounts parameters. The following parameters may be used to disable the controller submodule.
